option.practical-barrels.require_nbt.too: If depositing requires item NBT to match (non-functional)
option.practical-barrels.accept_damageab: Allow auto-depositing of damageable items to empty barrels
option.practical-barrels.accept_unstacka: Allow auto-depositing of unstackable items to empty barrels
option.practical-barrels.empty_barrel_de: If your main-hand stack is transferred to empty barrels
option.practical-barrels.auto_deposit.to: If depositing must be done manually
